doc.field: - Commercial Credit Co is raising 150 mln dlrs through an offering of notes due 1997 yielding 8.217 pct, said lead manager Morgan Stanley and Co Inc. The notes have an 8-1/8 pct coupon and were priced at 99.375 to yield 105 basis points more than comparable Treasury securities. Non-callable for life, the issue is rated Baa-2 by Moody's and BBB-plus by Standard and Poor's. First Boston Corp and Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc co-managed the deal.
